aboutme.name: Fabian Aps
aboutme.title: IT Professional/DJ/Producer with Passion
aboutme.description:
I am a {{age}} year old IT Professional/DJ/Producer and I
love developing software, but my internship at KfW
Banking Group showed me that application support also
comes naturally to me. Nevertheless, I still enjoy
development as a hobby. Music is also a passion of mine,
whether it's listening or producing.
